TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintDocument extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 定義從 Windows Forms 應用程式中列印時會將輸出傳送至印表機的可重複使用物件。

span.span: Defines a reusable object that sends output to a printer, when printing from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您建立的執行個體類別中，設定屬性，例如並，並呼叫方法來開始列印程序。Typically, you create an instance of the class, set properties such as the and , and call the method to start the printing process. 處理事件，您可以指定要列印，請使用輸出屬性。Handle the event where you specify the output to print, by using the property of the . 如需從一個 Windows Form 應用程式列印的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 列印支援](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/windows-forms-print-support.md)。For more information about printing from a Windows Form application, see the [Windows Forms Print Support](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/windows-forms-print-support.md). 如果您想要從 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印名為預設印表機上的 C:\My Documents\MyFile.txt 的檔案。The following code example prints the file named C:\My Documents\MyFile.txt on the default printer. 若要執行此範例，建立新的 Windows Form 專案，並貼入表單中，取代檔案內容的範例程式碼。To run the example, create a new Windows Forms project and paste the example code into the form, replacing the file contents. 適用於 C# 中，您必須刪除 Form1.Designer.cs 檔案。For C#, you will need to delete the Form1.Designer.cs file. 此外，變更您想要列印的檔案路徑。Also, change the path to the file you want to print. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例需要的頁面寬度，以符合每一行。The example requires that each line fits within the page width. 使用， ， ， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：在 Windows Forms 中列印多頁文字檔

span.span: How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設印表機的所有欄位的預設建構函式都初始化。The default constructor initializes all fields based upon the default printer. 一般而言之後建立新, ，設定印表機和頁面的設定會影響透過輸出和屬性，分別。Typically, after creating a new , you set printer and page settings that affect the output through the and properties, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定文件的頁面方向為橫向，並列印文件。The following code example sets a document's page orientation to landscape, and prints the document. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BeginPrint As PrintEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於呼叫 方法時 (在文件的第一頁列印之前)。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called and before the first page of the document prints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，您會處理事件，以初始化字型、 檔案資料流及其他列印程序期間所使用的資源。Typically, you handle the event to initialize fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process. 若要關聯事件與事件處理常式，加入的執行個體事件委派。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 在事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 如需有關如何使用委派處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Printing::PageSettings ^ DefaultPageSettings { System::Drawing::Printing::PageSettings ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Printing::PageSettings ^ value); };
member this.DefaultPageSettings : System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定頁面設定，其會使用為所有要列印頁面的預設設定。

span.span: Gets or sets page settings that are used as defaults for all pages to be printed.

value.span: 指定文件預設頁面設定的 。

span.span: A that specifies the default page settings for the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定數個預設頁面設定，透過屬性。You can specify several default page settings through the property. 例如，屬性會指定色彩，在列印頁面屬性會指定橫向或縱向方向，和屬性會指定頁面的邊界。For example, the property specifies whether the page prints in color, the property specifies landscape or portrait orientation, and the property specifies the margins of the page. 若要指定頁面的頁面為基礎的設定，請處理或事件，並修改引數包含在或分別。To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the or event and modify the argument included in the or , respectively. > [!NOTE] > 已開始列印之後，變更為 頁面設定，透過屬性不會影響正在列印的頁面。After printing has started, changes to page settings through the property will not affect pages being printed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定文件的頁面方向為橫向，並列印文件。The following code example sets a document's page orientation to landscape, and prints the document. 範例使三個假設： 變數名為`filePath`已設定的檔案路徑來列印; 方法名為`pd_PrintPage`，以處理已定義事件，;，但變數命名為`printer`已設定印表機的名稱。The example makes three assumptions: that a variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print; that a method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined; and that a variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要在列印文件時顯示的文件名稱 (例如，在列印狀態對話方塊中或在印表機佇列中)。

span.span: Gets or sets the document name to display (for example, in a print status dialog box or printer queue) while printing the document.

value.span: 列印文件時要顯示的文件名稱。

span.span: The document name to display while printing the document.
The default is "document".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性未指定要列印的檔案。The property does not specify the file to print. 相反地，您可以指定列印處理輸出事件。Rather, you specify the output to print by handling the event. 如需範例，請參閱類別概觀。For an example, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印具有彩色的第一頁的文件，如果印表機支援此功能，並設定使用者易記的名稱。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it, and sets the to a user-friendly name. 這個範例需要名為變數`printDoc`已建立，而和會處理事件。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event EndPrint As PrintEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於文件最後一頁列印時。

span.span: Occurs when the last page of the document has printed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，您會處理釋放字型、 檔案資料流，並在列印的過程中，使用其他資源的事件讓字型。Typically, you handle the event to release fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process, like fonts. 您指出有沒有更多的頁面，藉由設定列印屬性，以`false`在事件。You indicate that there are no more pages to print by setting the property to `false` in the event. 取消列印程序，或列印程序期間所發生的例外狀況，也就會發生事件。The event also occurs if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process. 若要關聯事件與事件處理常式，加入的執行個體事件委派。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 在事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 如需有關如何使用委派處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBeginPrint(class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnBeginPrint (e As PrintEventArgs)
abstract member OnBeginPrint : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs -> unit override this.OnBeginPrint : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

summary.span: 在呼叫 方法之後和文件的第一頁列印之前呼叫它。

span.span: It is called after the method is called and before the first page of the document prints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 當在衍生的類別呼叫方法，它會引發叫用委派事件處理常式的事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 這個方法會初始化的好地方。

span.span: This method is a good place for initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 取消列印程序，或列印程序期間所發生的例外狀況，也會呼叫方法。The method is also called if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process. 當在衍生的類別呼叫方法，它會引發叫用委派事件處理常式的事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 當在衍生的類別呼叫方法，它會引發叫用委派事件處理常式的事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 當在衍生的類別呼叫方法，它會引發叫用委派事件處理常式的事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出與頁面相關的圖形物件位置是否正好在使用者指定的邊界內部，或在頁面可列印區域的左上角。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the position of a graphics object associated with a page is located just inside the user-specified margins or at the top-left corner of the printable area of the page.

value.span: 如果圖形原點起始於頁面邊界，則為 ；如果圖形原點在可列印頁面的左上角，則為 。

span.span: if the graphics origin starts at the page margins; if the graphics origin is at the top-left corner of the printable page.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算可列印的區域必須知道文件，[] 頁面的邊界的實體大小和位置物件來源。Calculating the area available to print requires knowing the physical size of the paper, the margins for the page, and the location of the object origin. 當是`true`，則物件的位置會考量屬性值，並可列印頁面區域。When is `true`, the object location takes into account the property value and the printable area of the page. 當是`false`，只有頁面的可列印區域用來判斷的位置物件來源，值會被忽略。When is `false`, only the printable area of the page is used to determine the location of the object origin, the value is ignored. 比方說，如果是`true`，和每一端為 1 英吋物件中包含位於與左邊頁面頂端的 1 英吋。For example, if is `true`, and is set for 1 inch on each side, the object included in the is located 1 inch from the left and top of the page. .25 英吋為單位，每一端上的可列印頁面區域是否和是`false`，則物件是位於的.25 英吋與左邊頁面頂端。If the printable area of the page is .25 of an inch on each side and is `false`, the object is located .25 of an inch from the left and top of the page. > [!NOTE] > 可列印頁面區域而異的印表機，而且不保證是對稱。The printable area of a page varies from printer to printer and is not guaranteed to be symmetrical.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Print() cil managed

summary.span: 啟動文件的列印程序。

span.span: Starts the document's printing process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要列印處理的輸出事件並利用納入。Specify the output to print by handling the event and by using the included in the . 使用屬性來指定印表機的列印文件。Use the property to specify which printer should print the document. 方法列印文件，而不需使用 [列印] 對話方塊。The method prints the document without using a print dialog. 使用當您想要提供使用者將能夠選擇列印設定。Use a when you want to offer the user the ability to choose print settings. > [!NOTE] > 如果未處理的例外狀況方法時擲回列印、 列印的文件就會中止。If an exception that is not handled by the method is thrown during printing, the printing of the document is aborted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印到預設印表機的命令列透過所指定的檔案。The following code example prints the file that is specified through the command line to the default printer. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例需要的頁面寬度，以符合每一行。The example requires that each line fits within the page width. 使用， ， ， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 以 屬性命名的印表機並不存在。

span.span: The printer named in the property does not exist.

permission.span: 從受限制的對話方塊中的安全列印。

span.span: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Printing::PrintController ^ PrintController { System::Drawing::Printing::PrintController ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Printing::PrintController ^ value); };
member this.PrintController : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定指引列印程序的列印控制程式。

span.span: Gets or sets the print controller that guides the printing process.
The that guides the printing process.

value.span: 預設值為 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: The default is a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列印控制程式會指引列印程序以數種方式。A print controller guides the printing process in several ways. 例如，若要列印文件，您需要將它轉換成物件。For example, to print a document, you need to convert it to a object. A指定要在影像預覽列印或實際文件列印的印表機上繪製圖形的位置。A specifies where to draw the graphic in an image for a print preview or on a printer to actually print the document. 列印的控制站也可以指定是否要立即列印文件，或等候指定的間隔。A print controller can also specify whether to print a document immediately, or wait a specified interval. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例需要您已建立的執行個體類別，稱為`myPrintDocument`。The following code example requires that you have created an instance of the class that is named `myPrintDocument`. 此範例會建立的新執行個體類別中，將其指派給屬性`myPrintDocument`，並列印文件。The example creates a new instance of the class, assigns it to the property of `myPrintDocument`, and prints the document. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 從受限制的對話方塊中的安全列印。

span.span: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
Associated enumeration:

summary.span: 取得或設定列印文件的印表機。

span.span: Gets or sets the printer that prints the document.

value.span: 指定何處和如何列印文件的 。

span.span: A that specifies where and how the document is printed.

value.span: 預設值是其屬性設成預設值的 。

span.span: The default is a with its properties set to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定數個印表機設定，透過屬性。You can specify several printer settings through the property. 例如，使用屬性來指定您想要列印的份數屬性來指定要使用此項目，印表機和屬性來指定您想要列印的頁面範圍。For example, use the property to specify the number of copies you want to print, the property to specify the printer to use, and the property to specify the range of pages you want to print. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會在指定的印表機上列印文件。The following code example prints a document on the specified printer. 範例使三個假設:，變數的名稱`filePath`已設定的檔案路徑來列印; 方法名為`pd_PrintPage`，以處理已定義事件，;，但變數命名為`printer`已設定印表機的名稱。The example makes three assumptions: that a variable names `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print; that a method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined; and that a variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PrintPage As PrintPageEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於需要目前頁面的列印輸出時。

span.span: Occurs when the output to print for the current page is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定要列印的輸出，請使用屬性。To specify the output to print, use the property of the . 例如，若要指定要列印的文字行，繪製文字使用方法。For example, to specify a line of text that should be printed, draw the text using the method. 除了指定輸出，您可以指出是否有額外的頁面，藉由設定列印屬性設`true`。In addition to specifying the output, you can indicate if there are additional pages to print by setting the property to `true`. 預設值是`false`，這表示為沒有多個要列印的頁面。The default is `false`, which indicates that there are no more pages to print. 您也可以透過修改個別的頁面設定，而且可以藉由設定取消列印工作屬性設`true`。Individual page settings can also be modified through the and the print job can be canceled by setting the property to `true`. 若要列印的文件使用不同的頁面設定每一頁，處理事件。To print each page of a document using different page settings, handle the event. 若要關聯事件與事件處理常式，加入的執行個體事件委派。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 在事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 如需有關如何使用委派處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates handling the event. 如需其他範例，請參閱[How to:列印 Windows Form 中的多頁文字檔](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms.md)。For another example, see [How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms.md). 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：在 Windows Forms 中列印多頁文字檔

span.span: How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms
Windows Forms Print Support

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryPageSettings As QueryPageSettingsEventHandler

summary.span: 在 事件之前立即發生。

span.span: Occurs immediately before each event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就可以列印文件使用不同的頁面設定的每一頁。It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings. 您可以修改個別屬性的設定頁面設定屬性或屬性設定為。You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the property or by setting the property to a . 所做的變更影響只有目前頁面上，不在文件的預設頁面設定。Changes made to the affect only the current page, not the document's default page settings. 也可以藉由設定取消列印工作屬性，以`true`如。The print job can also be canceled by setting the property to `true` for the . 若要關聯事件與事件處理常式，加入的執行個體事件委派。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 在事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 如需有關如何使用委派處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如果您使用若要修改的印表機設定 的效能事件即使最佳化組態參數設定不會改善控制項。If you use the event to modify printer settings, the performance of the control will not improve even if an optimization configuration switch is set. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [PrintPreviewDialog 控制項概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/printpreviewdialog-control-overview-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [PrintPreviewDialog control overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/printpreviewdialog-control-overview-windows-forms.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印具有彩色的第一頁的文件，如果印表機支援它。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it. 這個範例需要名為變數`printDoc`已建立，而和會處理事件。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. `currentPageNumber`變數會遞增之後每一頁會列印在,事件，不會顯示。The `currentPageNumber` variable is incremented after every page is printed in the event, which is not shown. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#6)]

summary.span: 提供列印文件的相關資訊 (以字串形式)。

span.span: Provides information about the print document, in string form.
A string.
